tool_description: Get all current twitter trends from world
name: Twitter Trend
title: Twitter Trend

api_list.name: Collect trend
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com/trend/turkey/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com/trend/{country}/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get info
api_list.description: Gives more info about that trend
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com/getinfo/turkey/turkey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://twitter-trend.p.rapidapi.com/getinfo/{country}/{trendname}"
